name: jsonld-common-contexts
description: Cached versions of commonly used namespaces

scripts.docs: echo 'E: Documentation generation is temporarily disabled because of security vulnerabilities in dependencies of docker@^0.2.14. The command used was:' docker -i src -o apidocs -s -n -c vs
scripts.compile: coffee -c -o lib src ; cp -r src/contexts lib

author: kba
